name: Ratperson Chronicles
description:
Based on a prototype made in two weeks, then turned into a school project involving way too many people, Rat Person chronicles is visual-novel-esque game which tells the story of an Office Worker experiencing an existential crisis. One day a chance encounter with a time machine sends him on a journey through the ages, giving him opportunities to question himself about his identity and his meaning in life.

How to play:

  • Press A & D to navigate the text on the screen.
  • Click on the fists during the fighting minigame,
  • Use WASD and space to move around during the platforming minigame.
  • Press ESC to quit the game.
